title: The Ledger of Ghosts
story_summary: A hidden audit log goes public and shocks the city. People learn Halden erased histories and lives from the BCI system. Assemblies argue over what to remember and what to delete. The Council gives up control of city archives. A new civic group will decide how Stenograd remembers its past.

official.headline: Archive Access Expanded
official.anchor_line: Council authorizes independent assembly to oversee city records and safeguard civic memory.
official.contextual_reframing: Transparent process ensures collective resilience. Stenograd moves forward with fact-based reconciliation.

official.headline: Records Reviewed
official.anchor_line: Assemblies debate preservation of historical BCI data as citizens confront lost histories.
official.contextual_reframing: Inclusive dialogue supports community trust. System adapts for greater accountability.

official.headline: Audit Exposes Past
official.anchor_line: New audit reveals critical erasures under Halden. Residents join in citywide restoration of historical records.
official.contextual_reframing: Systemic integrity prevails as Stenograd renews commitment to truth and social cohesion.

underground.headline: Truth Leaks Out
underground.anchor_line: The files they buried are back - years of names and moments wiped by Halden's system, now exposed.
underground.contextual_reframing: Cover-ups unraveled. What else is in the archives they won't show us?

underground.headline: Lost Voices Return
underground.anchor_line: Ghosts from forgotten years flood back as survivors tell stories BCI tried to erase.
underground.contextual_reframing: They called it order. Why did stability mean erasing our families and friends?

underground.headline: History Up For Grabs
underground.anchor_line: No official story left - just bitter fights over what really happened, and who decides what's true.
underground.contextual_reframing: They fractured our memory. Now solidarity breaks as we search for the past in the rubble.
